overview: This is a test proposal for verifying the proposal generation tool works correctly.
problem1: Manual testing is time-consuming and error-prone
problem2: Lack of automated verification leads to missed bugs
problem4: No standardized testing framework in place
objective: Implement comprehensive automated testing for all tools
proposed_solution: Create integration tests with real API credentials to validate tool functionality
process_step1_desc: Analyze existing tools and identify test cases for each module
process_step2_desc: Create test fixtures and runner scripts for automated testing
process_step3_desc: Run tests against all modules and generate results report
deliverables: Test runner script, test fixtures, comprehensive test results report
